entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:49 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 09:58 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.4°C
Pressure: 99.6 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: SSE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
